Class UIGrid

A grid holding PosUIElements.

By default the grid repositions the elements when it is modified in some way (Ex. Rows, Columns, CellSize). To change this behavior, set AutomaticReposition to false. In this case, the grid will need to be manually repositioned with RepositionGridElements() after changes have been made.

GetColumnRowFromIndex(Int32, out Int32, out Int32)

Returns zero-based column and row numbers from an index in the grid.

Declaration
public void GetColumnRowFromIndex(int index, out int column, out int row)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Int32 index

The index to retrieve the zero-based column and row numbers for.
System.Int32 column

An out integer that will be the zero-based column number. -1 if the grid has 0 or fewer Columns.
System.Int32 row

An out integer that will be the zero-based row number. -1 if the grid has 0 or fewer Columns.
